modules.name: Entity Recognition
modules.description: Analyzes how AI systems identify and understand your brand as a distinct entity

insights.title: Strong brand entity signals detected
insights.description: Your brand is consistently recognized across 87% of AI training data sources

insights.title: Industry association is clear
insights.description: AI models correctly categorize TechFlow as a B2B SaaS provider in 94% of contexts

insights.title: Product-brand linkage established
insights.description: Core products are successfully linked to brand entity in knowledge graphs

issues.title: Inconsistent brand name variations
issues.description: AI systems sometimes confuse 'TechFlow' with 'Tech Flow' (separated)

issues.title: Missing structured data on key pages
issues.description: Organization schema markup absent on 3 important landing pages

recommendations.title: Standardize brand name usage
recommendations.description: Ensure consistent 'TechFlow' (one word) usage across all digital properties and content

recommendations.title: Implement comprehensive schema markup
recommendations.description: Add Organization and Product schema to all key pages for better entity understanding

recommendations.title: Build authoritative brand mentions
recommendations.description: Secure mentions in industry publications and directories to strengthen entity signals

modules.name: Sentiment Analysis
modules.description: Evaluates the sentiment and tone of content associated with your brand

insights.title: Overall positive sentiment detected
insights.description: 78% of brand mentions carry positive or neutral sentiment in AI training data

insights.title: Customer testimonials highly valued
insights.description: User reviews and case studies contribute significantly to positive sentiment

insights.title: Product quality consistently praised
insights.description: Feature discussions maintain 85% positive sentiment across sources

issues.title: Pricing concerns in community discussions
issues.description: Some negative sentiment around pricing model in Reddit and forum discussions

issues.title: Support response time mentioned negatively
issues.description: Customer support speed occasionally cited as a pain point

recommendations.title: Address pricing transparency
recommendations.description: Create detailed pricing guides and ROI calculators to address cost concerns proactively

recommendations.title: Highlight support improvements
recommendations.description: Publish content about support team expansion and response time improvements

recommendations.title: Amplify positive customer stories
recommendations.description: Increase visibility of success stories and positive case studies

modules.name: Citation Quality
modules.description: Assesses the quality and authority of sources that cite your brand

insights.title: Moderate citation diversity
insights.description: Citations come from 45 unique domains, but concentration is high in top 10

insights.title: Industry publications provide strong signals
insights.description: TechCrunch, VentureBeat citations carry high authority weight

insights.title: Academic citations limited
insights.description: Only 3 academic papers reference your technology

issues.title: Low-quality directory citations
issues.description: Many citations from low-authority business directories dilute overall quality

issues.title: Missing citations from key industry sites
issues.description: Not cited by Gartner, Forrester, or G2 research content

issues.title: Outdated citation content
issues.description: Some high-authority citations reference old product versions

recommendations.title: Pursue analyst relations program
recommendations.description: Engage with Gartner, Forrester, and IDC for research inclusion and citations

recommendations.title: Develop thought leadership content
recommendations.description: Publish research papers and whitepapers to earn academic and industry citations

recommendations.title: Update existing citations
recommendations.description: Reach out to sites with outdated citations to provide current information

recommendations.title: Disavow low-quality citations
recommendations.description: Request removal from spammy directories that harm citation quality

modules.name: E-E-A-T Signals
modules.description: Measures Experience, Expertise, Authoritativeness, and Trustworthiness signals

insights.title: Strong expertise signals from team
insights.description: Founder and team credentials are well-documented and authoritative

insights.title: Consistent content authorship
insights.description: Blog posts and resources have clear author attribution with bios

insights.title: Industry certifications present
insights.description: SOC 2, ISO 27001 certifications strengthen trust signals

insights.title: Customer proof points abundant
insights.description: Case studies and testimonials from recognizable brands boost authority

issues.title: Limited executive thought leadership
issues.description: CEO and leadership team have minimal public speaking or publication presence

issues.title: Transparency gaps in company information
issues.description: Team page lacks detailed backgrounds for some key personnel

recommendations.title: Expand executive visibility
recommendations.description: Secure speaking engagements and guest posts for CEO and CTO at major industry events

recommendations.title: Enhance team transparency
recommendations.description: Add comprehensive bios, LinkedIn links, and credentials for all team members

recommendations.title: Publish original research
recommendations.description: Create annual industry reports to establish thought leadership

modules.name: Content Relevance
modules.description: Evaluates how well your content matches user intent and AI query patterns

insights.title: Strong product documentation coverage
insights.description: Technical docs comprehensively cover user questions and use cases

insights.title: Blog content aligns with search intent
insights.description: 75% of blog posts match common user queries in your domain

insights.title: FAQ content well-structured
insights.description: FAQ sections directly address common AI-generated questions

issues.title: Content gaps in emerging topics
issues.description: Missing content for 15 high-volume query patterns related to AI integration

issues.title: Outdated content not refreshed
issues.description: 23% of content is over 18 months old and may not reflect current best practices

issues.title: Comparison content insufficient
issues.description: Lack of detailed competitor comparison content for informed decision-making

recommendations.title: Create AI integration content series
recommendations.description: Develop comprehensive guides on AI-powered workflows and integrations

recommendations.title: Implement content refresh program
recommendations.description: Update all content older than 12 months with current information and examples

recommendations.title: Build comparison framework
recommendations.description: Create detailed, honest comparisons with top 5 competitors

recommendations.title: Optimize for conversational queries
recommendations.description: Restructure content to answer natural language questions AI systems generate

modules.name: Brand Mention Context
modules.description: Analyzes the context and quality of how your brand is mentioned across the web

insights.title: Positive context in most mentions
insights.description: 82% of brand mentions appear in favorable or neutral contexts

insights.title: Strong association with key features
insights.description: Brand consistently mentioned alongside core value propositions

insights.title: Co-mentions with industry leaders
insights.description: Frequently mentioned alongside established competitors, indicating market presence

issues.title: Limited mention diversity
issues.description: Mentions concentrated in tech/SaaS circles, limited crossover to adjacent industries

issues.title: Negative context in support forums
issues.description: Some mentions in support contexts relate to unresolved issues

recommendations.title: Expand mention contexts
recommendations.description: Pursue partnerships and integrations to get mentioned in adjacent industry content

recommendations.title: Address support forum mentions
recommendations.description: Actively resolve and follow up on issues discussed in public forums

recommendations.title: Encourage user-generated content
recommendations.description: Create programs to incentivize customers to share success stories and use cases

insights.title: Strong branded keyword presence

insights.title: Long-tail keyword opportunities
insights.description: Strong performance on specific use-case keywords

issues.title: Missing from top-funnel keywords
issues.description: Absent from 45% of high-volume awareness-stage keywords in your category

issues.title: Competitor dominance in key terms
issues.description: Top 3 competitors have 3x more coverage on critical non-branded keywords

issues.title: Emerging keyword gaps
issues.description: Not ranking for 28 trending keywords related to AI and automation

recommendations.title: Develop top-funnel content strategy
recommendations.description: Create comprehensive guides and resources targeting awareness-stage keywords

recommendations.title: Build keyword-specific landing pages
recommendations.description: Create dedicated pages for top 20 non-branded keywords with high search volume

recommendations.title: Target emerging AI keywords
recommendations.description: Publish thought leadership content on AI trends and automation topics

recommendations.title: Optimize existing content for keywords
recommendations.description: Enhance current pages to better target secondary and related keywords
